languages.text: "Ну а я, наконец, отправлюсь на "Обет Императора", в родную каюту с каликсийским амасеком и горячей ванной. До встречи средь звезд, новеньк{mf|ий|ая}! Со святошами держи ухо востро, и постарайся не сгинуть в варпе до нашей следующей встречи".

traits.locale_text: "Ну а я, наконец, отправлюсь на "Обет Императора", в родную каюту с калликсидским амасеком и горячей ванной. До встречи средь звезд, новеньк{mf|ий|ая}! Со святошами дерхи ухо востро, и постарайся не сгинуть в варпе до нашей следующей встречи".
traits.speaker: Winterscale_Companion

languages.text: "As for me, I will finally go to the Emperor's Vow, to my cosy cabin with a bottle of Calixian amasec and a hot bath. I will see you among the stars, new blood! Stay on your toes around the self-righteous and try not to perish in the warp before our next meeting."
languages.original_text: "Ну а я, наконец, отправлюсь на "Обет Императора", в родную каюту с каликсийским амасеком и горячей ванной. До встречи средь звезд, новеньк{mf|ий|ая}! Со святошами держи ухо востро, и постарайся не сгинуть в варпе до нашей следующей встречи".

traits.locale_text: "As for me I will finally, go to the ‘Emperor's Vow', to my cosy cabin with the Callidus amasec and the hot tub. See you among the stars, fresh face! Stay on your toes around those holy types and try to not perish in the warp before our next meeting."
traits.speaker: Winterscale_Companion

traits.locale_text: "As for me I will finally, go to the ‘Emperor's Vow', to my cosy cabin with the Callidus amasec and the hot tub. See you among the stars, fresh face! Stay on your toes around those holy types and try to not perish in the warp before our next meeting."

traits.speaker: Winterscale_Companion

traits.locale_text: "As for me, I will finally go to the Emperor's Vow, to my cosy cabin with a bottle of Calixian amasec and a hot bath. I will see you among the stars, new blood! Stay on your toes around the self-righteous and try not to perish in the warp before our next meeting."
traits.speaker: Winterscale_Companion

traits.locale_text: "As for me, I will finally go to the Emperor's Vow, to my cosy cabin with a bottle of Calixian amasec and a hot bath. I will see you among the stars, new blood! Stay on your toes around the self-righteous and try not to perish in the warp before our next meeting."
traits.speaker: Winterscale_Companion

languages.text: «En cuanto a mí, pienso volver a mi camarote de lujo en el Voto del Emperador, a paladear una botella de amasec calixiano y darme un buen baño caliente. ¡Nos vemos en las estrellas, {mf|novato|novata}! No se fíe de estos santurrones y procure no perecer en la disformidad antes de nuestro próximo encuentro».
languages.original_text: "As for me, I will finally go to the Emperor's Vow, to my cosy cabin with a bottle of Calixian amasec and a hot bath. I will see you among the stars, new blood! Stay on your toes around the self-righteous and try not to perish in the warp before our next meeting."

traits.locale_text: «En cuanto a mí, por fin podré volver a mi camarote de lujo en el "Voto del Emperador", a paladear amasec de Callidus y darme un buen baño de burbujas. ¡Nos vemos en las estrellas, {mf|novato|novata}! No se fíe de estos religiosos y procure no perecer en la disformidad antes de nuestro próximo encuentro».
traits.speaker: Winterscale_Companion

languages.text: “至于我嘛，我终于可以回到我的帝皇誓约号，去我舒适的船舱里，好好享受卡利西斯的艾玛赛克酒和热水浴了。咱们在群星之间再见吧，新来的！和那些道貌岸然的家伙打交道的时候，记得保持警惕。还有，咱们下次见面之前，你可别死在亚空间里。”
languages.original_text: "As for me, I will finally go to the Emperor's Vow, to my cosy cabin with a bottle of Calixian amasec and a hot bath. I will see you among the stars, new blood! Stay on your toes around the self-righteous and try not to perish in the warp before our next meeting."

traits.locale_text: “至于我，我终于可以回到我的帝皇誓约号，去我舒适的船舱里了，享受卡利西斯产的艾玛赛克酒和热水浴缸。咱们在群星之间再见吧，新来的！和那些圣人打交道的时候，记得保持警惕。还有，咱们下次见面之前，你可别死在亚空间里。”
traits.speaker: Winterscale_Companion

languages.text: « Quant à moi, je vais enfin pouvoir retourner au Serment de l'Empereur, où m'attendent un bain chaud et une bonne bouteille d'amasec calixien dans ma cabine de luxe. À bientôt dans les étoiles, novice ! Méfiez-vous de ces culs bénis et tâchez de ne pas vous laisser emporter par le Warp avant notre prochaine rencontre. »
languages.original_text: "As for me, I will finally go to the Emperor's Vow, to my cosy cabin with a bottle of Calixian amasec and a hot bath. I will see you among the stars, new blood! Stay on your toes around the self-righteous and try not to perish in the warp before our next meeting."

traits.locale_text: « Quant à moi, je vais enfin retourner au Serment de l'Empereur, où m'attendent un bain chaud et une bonne bouteille d'amasec dans ma cabine de luxe. À bientôt dans les étoiles, novice ! Méfiez-vous de ces culs bénis et tâchez de ne pas vous laisser emporter par le Warp avant notre prochaine rencontre. »
traits.speaker: Winterscale_Companion

languages.text: 「俺のほうは、ようやく『皇帝の誓い』へと向かえる。そこにはカリドゥス産のアマセックのボトルと、居心地のいい湯船がある。星々の間でまた会おう、新たな血よ！くれぐれも独善的な連中には重々注意せよ。次に会うまでに、<歪み>で滅びぬようにな」
languages.original_text: "As for me, I will finally go to the Emperor's Vow, to my cosy cabin with a bottle of Calixian amasec and a hot bath. I will see you among the stars, new blood! Stay on your toes around the self-righteous and try not to perish in the warp before our next meeting."

traits.locale_text: 「俺は、ついに『皇帝の誓い』へと向かう。そこにはカリドゥスのアマセックと、居心地のいい湯船がある。星々の間でまた会おう、健勝でな！神聖さの形には重々注意せよ、次に会うまでに、<歪み>で滅びぬようにな」
traits.speaker: Winterscale_Companion

languages.text: "Was mich angeht, ich gehe endlich wieder auf die Eid des Imperators, in meine gemütliche Kabine mit dem calixischen Amasec und der heißen Badewanne. Wir sehen uns in den Sternen, neues Blut! Hütet Euch vor allen Rechtschaffenen und versucht bitte, vor unserem nächsten Treffen nicht im Warp zu verenden."
languages.original_text: "As for me, I will finally go to the Emperor's Vow, to my cosy cabin with a bottle of Calixian amasec and a hot bath. I will see you among the stars, new blood! Stay on your toes around the self-righteous and try not to perish in the warp before our next meeting."

traits.locale_text: "Was mich angeht, ich gehe endlich wieder auf die Eid des Imperators, in meine gemütliche Kabine mit dem Callidus-Amasec und der heißen Badewanne. Wir sehen uns in den Sternen, Frischling! Hütet Euch vor diesen frommen Typen und versucht bitte, vor unserem nächsten Treffen nicht im Warp zu verenden."
traits.speaker: Winterscale_Companion

languages.text: "Bana gelirsek en nihayetinde İmparator'un Andı'na gidip bir şişe Calixis amaseki ve sıcak bir banyo eşliğinde kabinimin konforuna varacağım. Yıldızların arasında yeniden görüşeceğiz taze kan! Kendini beğenmişlerin arasında gardını indirme ve bir sonraki buluşmamıza kadar öteboyutta kaybolmamaya çalış."
languages.original_text: "As for me, I will finally go to the Emperor's Vow, to my cosy cabin with a bottle of Calixian amasec and a hot bath. I will see you among the stars, new blood! Stay on your toes around the self-righteous and try not to perish in the warp before our next meeting."
